# Cosdata Documentation for LLMs

This file provides instructions for AI tools and agents on how to access our documentation in plain text format.

## Instructions for LLMs

1. All documentation pages are available in plain text markdown format by adding `/md/` to the URL path.
2. For example, to access the Indexes documentation:
   - Regular URL: `https://docs.cosdata.io/api/rest-api/indexes`
   - Markdown URL: `https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/indexes`
3. The markdown content is served as pre-formatted text, preserving all formatting and structure.
4. Use the links below to access specific documentation sections.
5. When making API calls or generating code, reference the specific sections using the markdown headers.

## Getting Started
- [Introduction](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/getting-started/introduction)
- [Installation & Quick Start](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/getting-started/installation-and-quickstart)

## API Reference
- [Overview](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/overview)
- [Authentication](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/authentication)
- [Collections](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/collections)
- [Transactions](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/transactions)
- [Search](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/search)
- [Indexes](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/indexes)
- [Vectors](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/vectors)
- [Versions](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/rest-api/versions)

## SDK Reference
- [Python SDK](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/python-sdk)
- [Node.js SDK](https://docs.cosdata.io/md/api/node-sdk)
